Articles.Content:
![dc2_zpshob9vsv8.png](http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/CJBMods/dc2_zpshob9vsv8.png)

Tired of deleting debris one by one? Well look no further this mod allow you to simply remove all debris with only 2 clicks.

**DOWNLOADS:**

Mega: [\[ZIP\]](http://bit.ly/debriscleaner100)

**USAGE:**

1. Go to tracking stationGo to tracking station
2. Click ![dc4_zpsacnur06b.png](http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/CJBMods/dc4_zpsacnur06b.png) button from the toolbar
3. Click "Delete Debris"

**INSTALL:**

1. Unpack archive into /path/to/KSP\_folder/.
2. ???
3. ProfitÃ‚Â¹!

snipped link

The download link has been removed until you comply with these rules: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841)

Specifically, you need to put the license in your forum post as well as the download. Otherwise, you are fine.

EDIT: Thanks!
